author: jm
msg: bug 5250: previous fix didn't deal with messages with no header/body separator; also, this way is more efficient, by pushing the header-line-ending encoding nearer to point of insertion in the rewrite_report_safe() and rewrite_no_report_safe() methods

author: jm
msg: File::Compare actually *creates* nonexistent files, so some error conditions causing strip2.t test failure were masked in a very confusing way.  fix
